argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tchval.n | |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) |
| 2 |  | tchcph.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | tchcph.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 4 |  | tchcph.1 | |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) |
| 5 |  | tchcph.2 | |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_phllmod | |- ( W e. PreHil -> W e. LMod ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_phllvec | |- ( W e. PreHil -> W e. LVec ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 13 | 8, 5, 12 | #P_cphsubrglem | |- ( ph -> ( F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) /\ ( Base ` F ) = ( K i^i CC ) /\ ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) |
| 15 | 13 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 8 | #P_isclm | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) /\ ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 14, 15, 16 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) |
